title: Himi 409
lyrics:
7.7.7.7. loua
(Ko ‘Aisea 32:2)
1.
Sīsū ko e Makatu’u,
Fakamalu kia au.
Kuo u hela ‘i he hal
a
,
Mo e potu la’ala’
ā
.
Ko e fu’u toafa ‘en
i
,
‘Ikai ha ‘akau lelei:
Ko e koto makamak
a
,
‘Ikai ha mālōlō’anga.
2.
Kuo u tuku pē ki mu
i
‘Ete me’a na’e mei maluʻ
i
,
Ko e paame ‘o ‘Ēlimi,
Si’i ‘akau ‘o Lefitimi.
Kuo mole ‘a e kakai
Na’a ku fa’a falala ai;
Toe pē ‘a e ‘Afion
a
Ko e Maka Laukuong
a
.
3.
Lau pē he palōfisai
‘E ‘i ai ha maka lah
i
,
Hopo hake he toaf
a
Fakamalu mei he la’ā.
Mālō kuo u ‘ilo ia
‘I he’ete mei pongia.
Lele, hoku ‘atamai,
‘O ke unga pē ki ai.
4.
Hoto ‘ofa he Maka n
i
‘Ene fakafale mai;
Pea u malu ai he la’ā,
Mo e angi ‘a e afā;
Peau inu ‘i he vai
‘Oku tafe hifo ai.
Sīsū ē, ke u nofo ma’u
‘I he malu pe ‘a’au. *
